short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your new tab with random fancy backgrounds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customize Your New Tab!
★ Change background of your new tab with an option to choose from anything that comes to mind.
With this extension, you can easily customize and set your own background, just type a word that suites you.
Customize Your New Tab lets you personalize your browsing experience and make your browser truly your own by letting you choose a background from our huge pool of backgrounds.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing Customize Your New Tab extension.
This extension changes your search provider on the New Tab to Microsoft Bing.
